description: Lightweight sandals made from wound cord.  They offer little in the way of protection, but keep you cool during warmer months.
Tough leather boots, for tough everyday work.
Leather boots covered with tiny, finely-carved bones.  With each step, the bones collide with each other and produce a melodic clicking.
A pair of steel-toed rubber boots, the sort worn by firefighters.
Boots made from the exoskeletons of insects.
Boots crafted from the carefully cleaned and pruned biosilicified exoskeletons of acidic ants.  Acid-resistant but brittle.
Modern reinforced tactical combat boots.  Very durable.
A pair of boots extending towards your lower leg, completely lined with denim.  Looks cool and has above average protection.
Armored foot protectors constructed from steel and Nomex for use by explosive ordnance disposal technicians.
Rubbery overshoes that cover your toes with sturdy, OSHA compliant steel toes.
Boots lined with fur for warmth.
Boots lined with fur for warmth.
Tough yet light leather boots, intended for outdoor activity.
Thick leather boots made specifically to protect the feet.  Light yet tough.
An extremely heavy set of armor plated boots.
A pair of rubber boots, often used while cleaning with caustic materials.
Boots made of random metal scraps attached to simple cloth wraps.  They're uncomfortable, but provide decent protection.

Some sheets of metal hammered to fit over the top of your foot and around your ankles, meant to be worn over boots.  They make walking a fair bit more awkward, but they'll keep your toes from being stomped on.
//: The weight assumes two small sheets of about 20cm x 10cm and two small sheets of about 30cm x 10 cm.

description: Sabatons made of sheet metal, hardened to protect your feet if you drop something heavy on them.  No relation to the band, aside from being very metal.
Leather boots with a steel toe, intended for use by workers.
A descendant of the classic steeltoed boot, this modern footwear has become popular among working class people over the last couple of decades.

Stiff leather boots with intricate embroidery and one-inch heels.  They look good, but these boots are made for walking, not running for your life.  Each boot is large enough to conceal a small holdout pistol.
Wool-lined boots designed for warmth.
Sport shoes with hard undersides and studs on the bottom designed to dig into grass.
Snug sport shoes with hard ridges on the bottom.
Known as klompen in the Netherlands and sabots in France, these wooden shoes have endured through the ages due to their simple design and durability.
Gigantic shoes fit for a clown.  Incredibly difficult to walk in.
Expensive black dance shoes with large heels.
Fancy patent leather shoes.  Not designed for running.
Simple sandals.  Somewhat difficult to run in.
These are upmarket "luxury" flip-flops.  Very difficult to run in.
Rags tied around your feet.  Not much of an improvement over being barefoot, but still better than nothing.
Fur pelts tied around your feet.  Not much of an improvement over being barefoot, but still better than nothing.
Faux fur patches tied around your feet.  Not much of an improvement over being barefoot, but still better than nothing.
Leather patches tied around your feet.  Not much of an improvement over being barefoot, but still better than nothing.
Felt patches tied around your feet.  Not much of an improvement over being barefoot, but still better than nothing.
A simple pair of geta.  Traditional wooden Japanese sandals with a fabric thong similar to flip flops.
A pair of high heels.  Difficult to even walk in.

variants.description: A traditional pair of tall, high-heeled shoes with a tapered, slender heel, which makes strutting fashionable, walking a challenge, and running an impossibility.  These days, they'd probably be more useful to stab a zombie's eyes out than as footwear.

These are a pair of chunky, broad-based shoes with a sturdy block-like heel, and while they don't do you any favors in the mobility department, they're at least more comfortable to trudge about in than their peers and won't likely cause irreversible damage to your feet.
A pair of tall, high-heeled, open-toed shoes with thick wedges running the length of the shoe, serving as its heels.

A pair of heavy, thick-soled high-heeled shoes with a ridiculously tall heel supported by an ankle strap and chunky soles.  A great choice for when you've given up on basic biomechanical function and decided that you're more than willing to risk long-term damage to your feet for the sake of a ridiculous fashion statement in the ruins of America.

The shoes of patriotic ladies around the nation, these open-toed heels glitter with small golden stars embroidered along their sides, with a pair of decorative flaps styled with the image of a miniature American flag unfurling from each ankle, like wings.  The footwear's heels consist of an adorably tiny reproduction of the Statue of Liberty situated beneath each sole, with their arms razed and supporting the shoe's heels.  Each of the statues' dresses is inscribed with the legend, "America Gives You Wings!"

description: Very long leather boots that cover the lower legs, they are cumbersome to wear.

variants.description: Very long leather boots that cover the lower legs, they are cumbersome to wear.

A pair of sturdy, over-the-knee, laceless boots fitted with a rubberized sole: these imposing combat boots provide good traction despite their encumbering nature.  Most commonly associated with totalitarian regimes due to their use by Nazi soldiers, this style of boot is warm, protective, and produces a deeply satisfying sound while marching.

A pair of knee-length, laceless boots formed from calfskin with an elastic side panel that's designed to stretch away to facilitate simple donning and doffing, these stylish stompers are a time-old gift from Victorian-age England.  Intended for you to fashionably saunter down roadways rather than sprint for your life, this style of boot became a style staple within London during the 1960s, where they were synonymous with the mod crowd.

description: Custom-made knee-high leather boots issued to motor officers.  Warm, durable and quite tough.
Sturdy leather hiking sandals with a heel strap.  Offers little in the way of protection, but keeps you cool during warmer months.
//: weight is based on an average of between 1 and 2 lbs for various hiking sandals IRL.

description: Lightweight shoes made of cloth and rubber.
A type of traditional Native American footwear sewn out of prepared leather or pelts.
A pair of durable boots used by dirt bikers and motorcyclists.
A pair of inline skates.  Very fast on flat floors, but they make it hard to move on rough terrain, take hits, or dodge effectively.
An old-fashioned pair of leather rollerskates with steel frames.  While quite fast on flat floors, they make it difficult to take hits or to move on rough terrain.
Simple shoes woven from strips of birch bark.  Not very comfortable, but better than going barefoot.
A pair of flat-soled shoes designed to give you a grip on slippery surfaces.
A pair of denim shoes.  They are cool and that's about it.
Soft shoes that keep your feet warm.  Not suitable for running.
Guaranteed to make you run faster and jump higher!
Sandals made from straw rope.  Not very comfortable, but can keep your feet safe.
Very long leather boots that reach past the knees, they are cumbersome to wear.
A pair of sneakers with integrated wheels.  Currently the wheels are retracted, making these essentially normal lace-up athletic shoes.

A pair of sneakers with integrated wheels, currently the wheels are out, allowing you to swiftly roll around on flat terrain.  You should probably pop them back in before you try fighting or going off-road.

use_action.msg: You pop the wheels back in.

description: Customized chainmail chausses that cover the feet, like booties made of chainmail.  The metal shows signs of rust and corrosion.
Customized chainmail chausses that cover the feet, like booties made of chainmail.
Customized chainmail chausses that cover the feet, like booties made of chainmail.
Customized chainmail chausses that cover the feet, like booties made of chainmail.
Customized chainmail chausses that cover the feet, like booties made of chainmail.
Customized chainmail chausses that cover the feet, like booties made of chainmail.
A snug-fitting pair of stockings made from thin and lightweight Nomex fabric.
Socks.  Put 'em on your feet.
Short socks, commonly used for sports.  These are designed to protect your feet from friction, not temperature.
A pair of disposable plastic bags, adapted to be used as socks.
Cheap socks designed to be worn once and then thrown away.  They keep your feet clean, but are too thin to give any protection.
Warm socks made of wool.
Long cotton socks that reach above the knees to help protect from the cold.
//: Variants ordered by color, and then pattern of striped, polka dot, floral, checkered

variants.description: This one is colored black.
This one is colored white.
This one is black, with white stripes.  Or is it white with black stripes?
This one is colored red.
This one is colored red with a polka dot pattern.
This one is colored in various shades of red with a floral pattern.
This one is colored yellow.
This one is colored green.
This one is colored orange with a striped pattern.
This one is colored blue.
This one is colored blue and white with a striped pattern.
This one is colored in various shades of blue with a floral pattern.
This one is colored blue and black with a checkered pattern.
This one is colored purple.
This one is colored purple and white with a striped pattern.
This one is colored purple with a polka dot pattern.
This one is colored in various shades of purple with a floral pattern.
This one is colored pink.
This one is colored pink and white with a striped pattern.
This one is colored pink with a polka dot pattern.
This one is colored green and white with a striped pattern.
This one is colored gray and white with a striped pattern.
This one is colored brown.
This one is colored brown with a polka dot pattern.
This one has patterns akin to the pride flag.
This one has patterns akin to the lesbian flag.
This one has patterns akin to the bisexual flag.
This one has patterns akin to the transgender flag.
This one has patterns akin to the asexual flag.
This one has patterns akin to the aromantic flag.
This one has patterns akin to the pansexual flag.
This one has patterns akin to the genderqueer flag.
This one has patterns akin to the genderfluid flag.

This one has patterns akin to the non-binary flag.
This one has patterns akin to the intersex flag.
This one has patterns akin to the polysexual flag.

description: Six long cotton tubes sized to fit over tentacles and help protect them from the cold.
A pair of split toe black tabi socks.  Usually worn as a part of traditional Japanese clothing.  The big toe is separated from the others by the fabric to be comfortably worn with thonged footwear.

A pair of split toe white tabi socks, as used by martial arts practitioners.  Usually worn as a part of traditional Japanese clothing.  The big toe is separated from the others by the fabric to be comfortably worn with thonged footwear.
A flexible set of jointed lames that can be worn over footwear for additional protection, traditionally worn by mounted knights.
Originating from the Pyrenees and made from a rope sole and cloth, these shoes are perfect for the hot weather, sipping Sangria and dodging tourists.
A pair of thin traditional Japanese split toed boots sewn out of leather.

A pair of comfortable modern split toed jika-tabi shoes with a rubber base.  Also known as ninja shoes.  Though originally developed for laborers in Japan, in the west they are usually found being used in outdoor martial arts practice.
